price: (Rántí) nígbà tí wọ́n sọ pé: “Dájúdájú Yūsuf àti ọmọ-ìyá rẹ̀ ni bàbá wa nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí ju àwa. Ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn sì ni àwa. Dájúdájú bàbá wa mà ti wà nínú àṣìṣe pọ́nńbélé.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِينَا مِنَّا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّ أَبَانَا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qālū layūsufu wa-akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun inna abānā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
